name: Master in Management
title: Master in Management
description:
Build a Strong Foundation for a Future in Business & Leadership
The Master in Management (MiM) at Nanyang Business School is designed for early-career professionals and recent graduates who want to build core business skills and thrive in a global business environment.
1. Transformative Business Education for Impactful Careers
Gain foundational business knowledge alongside emerging topics in AI, sustainability, and innovation—delivered through NTU’s world-class tech and research ecosystem.
2. Accelerate Your Career Through Industry-Relevant Skills
Gain strategic thinking, cultural intelligence (CQ), and leadership skills through a structured, focused curriculum developed with real employer expectations in mind.
3. Global Learning in Asia’s Most Connected Business Hub
Experience a safe, vibrant, and multicultural education in Singapore — Asia’s global gateway and a hub for top multinationals.
Download Brochure
Apply Now
Submit your CV
Attend our Events
Join our Mailing List
Download Brochure
Graduate Studies Blog
Schedule 1 to 1 Consultation
Connect With Us at NBS!
